articles.content: The Indian colts received a pat on the back from National Cricket Academy (NCA) head VVS Laxman after they overcome a spate of COVID positive cases in a “phenomenal” manner to win their match against… [+1396 chars]

articles.author: Shahid Judge
articles.title: Sania Mirza: Smashing the ‘moonball’ mediocrity to be a global tennis celebrity, supermom with a strong voice - The Indian Express
articles.description: One of the most quotable and articulate athletes from India, Sania Mirza has never shied away from calling a spade a spade. For the past few years, she’s been vocal about the role she’s played in being a mother and a working professional.
articles.content: By the summer of 2001, when Sania Mirza made her first foray into the senior tour, there were just two Indian women who had made a mark on the international tennis scene. There was Nirupama Mankad, w… [+6347 chars]
